summary: Replace \"Dibella\" Statue Texture. Remove surface crack and more smooth skin.
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------
Flawless Dibella v1.0
-----------------------
2012/0212

Texture replace MOD for \"Dibella\" Statue.
Remove surface crack and more smooth skin.
Both Large-size(Temple Statue Located in Markarth) and Mini-size(Miscellaneous Items) replace.

Install:
Use NMM or manually copy .dds files in your \\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\clutter\\statues folder(if no folders, make manually).

Licensing/Legal:
Free to edit and redistribute on your own risk, credits no-required.

Enjoy.
author: saixml
